key.name: startup-action
key.description: Set the startup action. Set to empty value to take no action on startup. Set to "RESTART" to start the most recently started configuration on startup. Set to "STARTID:{id}" to start a configuration with specific id on startup. Set to "STARTNAME:{name}" to start a configuration with specific name on startup.

key.name: most-recent-configuration-id
key.summary: Id of the most recently started configuration.
key.description: Id of the most recently started configuration.
